Package fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.ottokyosti

Class Main

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.ottokyosti.Main
public class Main extends Object
The class Main contains the lottery application's methods. The Main claass also declares static and final static variables before any methods to be used in them.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      The main method which handles user input queries (asking for the UI, asking for the numbers) and is the main method where the lottery application will loop
      Parameters:
      args - the array to which you can input values using the command line. Will be used as an array for the lottery if the user decides so

    • gameInProgress

      public static boolean gameInProgress​(int[] UserArray, String answer)
      The gameInProgress is the method where the actual lottery application takes place. It uses calculateLotto method to get random lottery line, it keeps track of the years using weeks as a counter, it also checks for how many correct numbers are between the two arrays and it saves the specific years in an array to create a "bestOf" list
      Parameters:
      UserArray - the array created in the main method and where the user's inputs are stored
      answer - the String variable which holds the answer to whether user wants to see the UI
      Returns:
      boolean value, which depends if the lottery is completed within lifetime (120y) or not
